Chapter 4319 - Chapter 4319: 4318 Primal Chaos Stone, Controlling Time!

Chapter 4319: 4318 Primal Chaos Stone, controlling time!

Translator: 549690339

The ball had lost the palpitating energy from before.

It looked much calmer now.

Wang Xian’s soul fragment stood in front of the ball and sized it up curiously.

“Let’s see if I can get it away.”

Wang Xian decided to study the ball carefully.

The loss this time was too great. He had to retrieve it from the ball.

Otherwise, he would suffer a huge loss!

Wang Xian’s soul fragment stretched out his arm and wrapped around the round ball.

Buzz

To his surprise, this round ball could move him easily.

This surprised Wang Xian.

“Prepare for research!”

Wang Xian thought to himself.

A portion of the soul in the tree of Chaos returned to the Dragon Palace.

Following that, Wang Xian arrived at the ancestral tree and entered a mother’s womb fruit.

There were eight mother’s womb fruits that were originally ripe. Now, there were only two left.

The other three were drained of their energy and withered.

After entering the mother’s womb fruit, Wang Xian’s body slowly condensed.

Gradually, his body recovered completely, including the body of the Void Dragon God.

“I used up four maternal fruits in one go.”

Wang Xian felt his heart ache. He moved his body and arrived at the location of the tree of chaos once again.

Following that, he flew into the distance again.

This round ball was a little strange and powerful. If Wang Xian wanted to study him, he naturally had to find a safe place.

In order to prevent any accidents from happening.

After flying into the chaotic void, Wang Xian’s mind stirred.

The current him had a passageway with the sphere.

Wang Xian’s soul fragment, which was beside the sphere, pulled the sphere and flew into the passageway.

Crack! Crack

When he flew over with the sphere, Wang Xian could see that the passageway had started to collapse again.

Following that, a sphere appeared in front of him.

When the sphere arrived in front of Wang Xian, it seemed that there was no longer any danger.

He sized up the ball that had cost him a lot. His eyes sparkled.

Wang Xian stretched out his hand and injected a surge of energy into the ball. The ball did not react at all.

This made him raise his eyebrows.

“It’s not absorbing energy anymore. It seems that it’s completely saturated. What is the use of this ball absorbing so much energy?”

Wang Xian said as he got closer. He studied it carefully, wanting to analyze it thoroughly.

However, even with Wang Xian’s powerful strength, he couldn’t see through this ball.

“What is this thing? If I didn’t see its power before, I would have thought that this is an ordinary chaos stone.”

Wang Xian frowned.

He pondered for more than ten minutes before a thought came to his mind!

Wang Xian spat out a mouthful of blood. Following that, the energy enveloped the ball and he was prepared to refine it.

He was prepared to use the method of refining the treasure to refine this ball.

Buzz

However, in the next moment, it had a huge effect.

When Wang Xian’s spirit and blood landed on the ball, a stream of information appeared in Wang Xian’s mind.

Following that, an image appeared in Wang Xian’s mind.

The image was extremely shocking. It was as though the world had been split apart!

In his mind, a sphere was suspended in the dead silence of the Void. Suddenly, the entire sphere exploded and was divided into ten pieces.

Each piece contained a type of elemental energy.

This was metal, wood, water, fire, Earth, wind, lightning, light, darkness, and space.

The ten pieces of energy were suspended in the void and began to collide with each other.

The collision of the ten elemental energies caused various scenes to appear in the surrounding void!

Following that, some special energies were born around the ten elemental energy stones.

Various attributes were also born around them.

For example, rocks, trees, meteorites, Frost, and all sorts of special items.

Following the continuous attacks of the ten elemental energy stones, all sorts of items appeared.

There were even planets being born.

This seemed to be the beginning of the world.

Wang Xian looked at the scene in his mind and his face was filled with shock.

The ball exploded and was categorized into ten attributes. When the ten attributes collided, the universe was transformed into a galaxy.

This? ? ?

“Primal Chaos Stone!”

Finally, a piece of information appeared in Wang Xian’s mind.

Primal Chaos Stone. This was the name of the ball.

Buzz Buzz

At this moment, the primal chaos stone trembled slightly and flew directly into Wang Xian’s body.

Wang Xian did not panic at all as he watched.

The Primal Chaos Stone had been refined by him initially.

When the primal Chaos Stone entered his body, it did not shrink to a certain part of his body.

Instead, it completely fused with Wang Xian’s body.

However, Wang Xian could feel that this fusion was not a perfect fusion.

It seemed to have only fused with one-ten-thousandth of his body.

“Ding, a powerful energy has been detected fusing with the host. The fusion rate is one-ten-thousandth!”

At this moment, the voice of the Divine Dragon System rang out once again, causing Wang Xian’s eyes to flicker slightly.

The Primal Chaos Stone disappeared and fused with Wang Xian.

He floated there quietly and felt the changes in his body.

When the primal Chaos Stone entered his body, it did not increase Wang Xian’s strength significantly.

This was because Wang Xian was not able to completely control the primal chaos stone.

He was only able to fuse with one-thousandth of it.

However, after fusing with one-thousandth of it, Wang Xian had a hint of control over the primal chaos stone.

With a move of his palm, the primal chaos stone appeared in front of him once again.

Wang Xian stared at the primal chaos stone with his mind. The Primal Chaos Stone opened an entrance that allowed people to enter.

Wang Xian’s body of the Void Divine Dragon was separated from his body and entered the stone directly.

After entering the primal chaos stone that was only ten meters in size, the space inside was extremely huge. It was even boundless.

Wang Xian sensed it quietly. With a move of his palm, he took out a piece of the god of elements fragment and threw it into the hands of the Void Divine Dragon.

The body of the Void Divine Dragon held this piece of the god of elements fragment and activated the energy within to surround his body.

Following that, Wang Xian had a strange feeling.

He felt that time around him had become very, very slow. It was as if time had frozen!

At the same time, the energy of the fragment of the god of elements in his hand was also being consumed continuously.

As Wang Xian sensed all of this, a fiery glow erupted from his eyes.

“This… controls the flow of time?”

Wang Xian revealed a shocked expression.

Even though he had some guesses in his heart, he was still extremely shocked after experiencing it.

In the entire universe, there was only one person who was the most powerful and invincible — time!

However, in this primal chaos stone, it could actually slow down time.

This was simply unbelievable!

The time in the primal chaos stone was different from the time in the outside world.

As for the exact difference in the flow rate, Wang Xian still needed to conduct continuous experiments.

However, just this point in the primal chaos stone was enough to shock him.

If he could control time, he would be invincible.

“If I want to control time, I might have to fuse with the primal chaos gem 100% !”
